content.description: Armor also affects listed weapons' damage and reflects enemy damage. Character gains bonus damage depending on missing health. Defeating enemies with retaliatory damage gives +1.0 Max Health.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Works with: **Cross**, **King Bible**, **Garlic**, **La Borra**, **Song of Mana**, **Vento Sacro**, **Victory Sword**

content.title: IX - Divine Bloodline
